perturbation.original_text: 2.1 Customer Support. eGain will provide live telephone support to Customer 24-hours-a-day, seven-days-a-week by a trained eGain customer support representative.
perturbation.changed_text: 2.1 Customer Support. eGain will provide live telephone support to Customer during Normal Business Hours by a trained eGain customer support representative.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states 24/7 support. The modified text restricts it to 'Normal Business Hours', which creates a contradiction and makes it unclear when support is actually available.

perturbation.original_text:
6.  Limited Warranties; Disclaimer of Warranties.





6.1 eGain warrants and represents to Customer that (i) the Software will perform substantially in accordance with the documentation, if any, provided by eGain to Customer, and (ii) the Hosting Services will be performed in a professional and workmanlike manner and in accordance with Section 2.
perturbation.changed_text:
6.  Limited Warranties; Disclaimer of Warranties.





6.1 eGain warrants and represents to Customer that the Hosting Services will be performed in a professional and workmanlike manner and in accordance with Section 2. Notwithstanding the foregoing, eGain does not guarantee any specific outcome or result from the Hosting Services.
perturbation.explanation: The original text warrants that hosting services will be performed in a professional and workmanlike manner. The modified text adds a disclaimer stating that eGain doesn't guarantee any specific outcome, which contradicts the original warranty. This creates ambiguity regarding the level of service eGain is obligated to provide.

perturbation.original_text:
10. Term and Termination.

10.1 Term and Termination. This Agreement shall continue in effect from the Effective Date for a one (1) year period, unless earlier terminated as set forth below, and thereafter shall renew automatically for successive one (1) year periods unless either party gives the other party at least thirty (30) days prior written notice of its intent not to renew the Agreement. In addition, either party may terminate this Agreement by giving to the other party written notice

eGAIN COMMUNICATIONS CORPORATION

HOSTING AGREEMENT

of such termination upon the other party's material breach of any material term (subject to the other party's right to cure within thirty (30) days after receipt of such notice), the other party's insolvency, or the institution of any bankruptcy or similar proceedings by or against the other party.
perturbation.changed_text:
10. Term and Termination.

10.1 Term and Termination. This Agreement shall continue in effect from the Effective Date for a one (1) year period, unless earlier terminated as set forth below, and thereafter shall renew automatically for successive one (1) year periods unless either party gives the other party at least thirty (30) days prior written notice of its intent not to renew the Agreement. In addition, eGain may terminate this Agreement at any time, for any reason, by providing Customer with written notice of such termination. 

eGAIN COMMUNICATIONS CORPORATION

HOSTING AGREEMENT

of such termination upon the other party's material breach of any material term (subject to the other party's right to cure within thirty (30) days after receipt of such notice), the other party's insolvency, or the institution of any bankruptcy or similar proceedings by or against the other party.
perturbation.explanation: The original text outlines specific conditions for termination, including material breach, insolvency, or bankruptcy. The modified text introduces a clause allowing eGain to terminate the agreement 'at any time, for any reason,' which directly contradicts the original termination clauses and creates uncertainty about the agreement's stability.
